cases.description: Normal BP - 6-year-old boy, SBP/DBP well below 90th
cases.source: Age 6, male. Table: SBP90=105, DBP90=66, SBP95=109, DBP95=70. SBP 95<105, DBP 60<66 → Normal (score=0).

cases.description: Elevated BP - 10-year-old girl, SBP at 90th percentile
cases.source: Age 10, female. Table: SBP90=109, DBP90=72, SBP95=113, DBP95=76. SBP 110>=109(90th) but <113(95th) → Elevated (score=1).

cases.description: Stage 1 HTN - 8-year-old boy, SBP at 95th percentile
cases.source: Age 8, male. Table: SBP90=107, DBP90=69, SBP95=111, DBP95=73. SBP 112>=111(95th) but <111+12=123 → Stage 1 (score=2).

cases.description: Stage 2 HTN - 5-year-old girl, SBP well above 95th+12
cases.source: Age 5, female. Table: SBP90=104, DBP90=64, SBP95=108, DBP95=68. SBP 125>=108+12=120 → Stage 2 (score=3).

cases.description: Adolescent (15yo) - Stage 1 HTN by static thresholds
cases.source: Age 15 (>=13, static thresholds). SBP 132>=130 → Stage 1 (score=2). DBP 78<80 doesn't change.
